entity.name: Greg Abbott
entity.description: US Governor of Texas, Greg Abbott

text: Gov. Greg Abbott is allowing limits on outdoor crowds — but not indoor gatherings. His party's convention — with an expected attendance of 6,000 — so far will not require attendees to wear face masks. Story via @TexasTribune https://t.co/oiOmtDC2Xl
